oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ʻIqd al-jumān fī faḍāyil laylat niṣf Shaʻbān / li-nāẓim al-madīḥ al-nabawī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān [ibn] Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Misk al-Sakhāwī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī al-Burhānī : manuscript, 1848
ʻIqd al-jumān fī faḍāʼil laylat niṣf Shaʻbān
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sakhāwī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad , 1616-1711
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Abū al-Ḥusayn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الحمد لله احق من شكر واولى من حمد واكرم من تفضل بالدليل وبالذليل عبد القديم... : Incipit
According to the colophon (f. 22r), copy completed in 1264 AH [1848 AD].
Bound. Marbled paper over boards; brown leather on spine and corners.
Written in one column, 9 lines per page, in black and red.
From the books of Abū al-Ḥusayn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad.

With this is bound: Kitāb Basṭ al-yadayn li-ikrām al-abawayn / Muḥammad Ghawth ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad (ff. 25r-49v) -- Risālah fī iʻrāb al-rabb min Allāhumma Rabb hādhihi al-daʻwah / Ṣibghat Allāh ibn Muḥammad Ghawth ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad (ff. 51r-58r).
MS Arab SM4301. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: عقد الجمان في فضائل ليلة نصف شعبان
عقد الجمان في فضايل ليلة نصف شعبان / لناظم المديح النبوي عبد الرحمن [بن] أحمد بن عبد الرحمن بن علي بن أحمد بن المسك السخاوي الأنصاري الشافعي البرهاني : مخطوطة، 1848
